pages.text: This $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() calls on the Lord of $(l:bewitchment:brewing/brewing_basics)Brews$(), summoning $(l:bewitchment:creatures/leonard)Leonard$() himself.$(br2)Make sure to keep him away from things you hold dear.$(br2)Prepare $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Grotesque Stew$(), should you want to $(l:bewitchment:tools/grotesque_stew)Pledge$() to him.$(br2)The $(l:bewitchment:rituals/rituals)Ritual$() is started by sacrificing a Sheep with an $(l:bewitchment:tools/athame)Athame$().
